name: OMSI 2 - Add-on Wuppertal
description: NOTICE: Requires the base game OMSI 2 in order to play. Activation key must be used on a valid Steam account. Requires an internet connection. About the game	 On the road in Wuppertal: With the new OMSI 2 Add-on Wuppertal you now have the opportunity to discover the large green city with lots of realistically modelled buildings along 21 km of route.	On four real bus lines you bring your passengers through the city centre of Wuppertal that has been realised with numerous details. The city bus for this job is available in both solo and articulated variants and can be repainted individually using the several included paintings. Within the bus you will be able to hear original announcements due to the licences granted by the local transportation company WSW.	  As a special highlight, this add-on also includes the landmark of Wuppertal  the suspension railway. Along the drivable route you can discover the city from above, as well. 	  Key features   Latest generation city bus in solo and articulated variants  Drivable suspension railway of the latest generation  4 bus lines and 1 suspension railway line  Over 40 real AI routes  21 km of available route through Wuppertal  Official licences of the WSW  Licensed original announcements of the WSW  Real schedule data of the WSW  Many details along the routes  Many paintings  Varied, realistic line layouts  Many realistic buildings from Wuppertal            system requirements  Windows - Minimum  OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10  Processor: Quad-Core-CPU with 3,0 GHz  Memory: 4 GB RAM  Graphics: 1 GB VRAM  DirectX: Version 9.0c  Storage: 4 GB available spaceCopyright © 2018 AEROSOFT.
